amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the United States Fire Administration by $1.8 million and to reduce funding for the Secretary of Homeland Security's departmental operation and administrative account by $2.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the U.S. Fire Administration account by $1,838,000 and decrease funds for the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management account by $2,838,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
